Reviews.Title: “Great Location, Fabulous Staff”
Reviews.Author: OCHillie
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel november 9 10 11 departing florence surprised close hotel street cross road walk street corner trevi fountains lit night quick walk pizza street corner metrothe staff extremely friendly allowing internet anytime breakfast lots selection eventually returned hotel nights italian vacation times housed annex door time 3rd floor workout elevator visit 1st floor spacious size bathroom typical italian style rome fabulous trip sunny days day highly recommend hotel expecting 5 star amenities

Reviews.Title: “Great value for money”
Reviews.Author: TOl3
Reviews.Content: lucky stay domus julia hotel recently husband children hotel recommended family recommended hotel location quiet street 5 minute walk trevi fountain stayed family suite clean accommodate comfortably breakfasts delicious staff courteous helpful fault relation hairdryer bit lacked power minor issue domus julia luxury hotel clean comfortable represents value money definitely stay

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic little b&b in the heart of Rome's historic centre”
Reviews.Author: Vicstick77
Reviews.Content: read previous negative reviews hotel site id booked stay expecting basic accomodation wonderful surprise negative reviews inaccurate humble opinion domus julia clean tidy comfortable functional attractive air conditioned bed comfy quiet plenty piping hot water showering etc found staff friendly available front desk 247 spoke english able book day trips provided helpful map city leaflets travel options breakfast offering range pastries cereal meats cheeses beverages location absolutely suberb barberini gallery top street piazza barberini minute walk metro station located links vatican colosseum termini station etc easy safe 10 minute walk trevi fountain spanish steps plenty bars restaurants hand highly recommend domus julia stay fantastic

HotelInfo.Name: Domus Julia
HotelInfo.Address: Via Rasella 32, 00187 Rome, Italy
